# How To Take Payments With The Card Reader Direct Connection

## Article Content

PAYMENTS
CREDIT CARDS
Taking Payments with a Card Reader Connected to Your iPhone or iPad

After connecting a card reader directly to your iPhone or iPad (direct connection), you can use it to take payments.

In the Mangomint app, start the checkout as you normally would.

On the Payments screen, select the Card Reader payment button.

Have the client tap, insert, or swipe their credit card using the card reader.

When the card reader beeps, the client can remove their card.

Have the client select a tip percentage or enter a custom tip amount.

Have the client provide their signature.

Once the sale is complete, the client can choose how they'd like to receive their receipt.

The sale in Mangomint will be marked as Closed.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
